_sText:
This is the first map of new game mod named Hooligans Wars.
I got inspired when I was watching TV News and sod Hooligan War with police.
Now lets talk about this.

AND PLEASE WHEN SOMEBODY CHOSE CT SIDE IT WILL BE COOL THAT EVERY CT IS AN GIGN THAT IS FOURTH MODEL IN CT SIDE

CT are spawned with Riot Shields and one flashbang.
When they touch Terrorists with that riot shield Terorrists will die.
Terrorist are spawned with only one magazine of pistol USP that is 12 bullets.

NOTICE 

CT Can go to Terrorist side and pick USP or Terrorists can go to CT side and pick Riot Shield. But Terrorist must be cearful because when they touch Riot Shield from front side it will cill them no matter is Riot Shield carried by CT , T or Nobody.

Now I will give you a download link of an VMF file so you can see how to build one of these maps.

http://gamebanana.com/css/prefabs/6217

You can see an example match of this map but with bots ( HAVE IN MIND YOU CAN PLAY THIS WITH BOTS BUT THEY ARE STUPID )

LINK COMING SOON

Map by BIG SMOKE
